caption:
This CHICKEN & PROSCIUTTO TORTELLONI WITH WHITE WINE CREAM SAUCE is perfect for those nights when you want a fancy meal in less than 30 minutes!

You’ll need…⁠
9 oz BUITONI Chicken & Prosciutto Tortelloni  2 Tbsp butter⁠
1 Tbsp flour⁠
3 cloves garlic minced⁠
1/2 cup dry white wine⁠
¾ cup heavy cream⁠
1/2 cup BUITONI Parmesan Cheese⁠
1-2 tablespoons parsley, chopped⁠
Salt & pepper to taste⁠

Directions: ⁠
MELT butter to pan over medium heat. Sprinkle flour and cook for 1-2 minutes until golden brown.⁠
ADD garlic and white wine. Let bubble and reduce by half. Whisk in heavy cream. Take sauce off the heat and add parmesan. Stir to melt and combine. ⁠
PREPARE tortelloni according to package directions. Reserve ¼ cup pasta water.⁠
ADD cooked tortelloni to the sauce and place back on the heat and add reserved pasta water as needed to thin out sauce. ⁠
TOP with parsley to serve.

TIMESAVER:  Warm BUITONI Alfredo Sauce in a small saucepan over medium heat.  Stir in ½ cup dry white wine.
